name: Merrell Thermo Kiruna Mid Shell Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
categories: Thermo Kiruna Mid Shell Waterproof Winter Boo
description: Waterproof winter boots that offer considerable warmth. The winter-worthy sole  provides grip on icy surfaces. Great for exploring or just getting around easily.Full-grain waterproof leather.M-Select Dry waterproof-breathable membrane lets sweat escape.Bellows tongue keeps debris out.Metal hooks for secure lacing.Second lace option adds a pop of colour.Conductor™ fleece lining for added warmth200 gram M Select™ WARM insulation extends over the toe.Heat-reflecting insole radiates body heat back toward the footRemovable Merrell Kinetic Fit™ BASE insole comforts underfoot.Compression-moulded EVA midsole stabilizes and cushions feet.M Select™ GRIP outsole provides traction on both wet and dry surfaces.5mm lug depth grips snow and ice.
